title: Engineering Electromagnetics
description: Course will cover electromagnetic wave propagation, transmission lines, waveguides, and antennas. (Formerly EE 136.)

conditions.restricted_to_majors: School of Engineering and Division of Physical and Biological Sciences majors or permission of instructor.

pre_req_data.text: Prerequisite(s): ECE 135 and ECE 135L. Enrollment is restricted to School of Engineering and Division of Physical and Biological Sciences majors or permission of instructor.
